title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When performing a SaveAs operation on a java file, the file extension is not remembered. Additionally, the icon for the saved file is changed from the original javafile icon to a generic file icon.
EB: The SaveAs operation should remember the file extension and the icon for the saved file should remain as the original javafile icon.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Make modifications to the file.
3) Click on the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save icon.
4) A dialog will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename, but ignore the extension as it is not requested.
7) Click Ok.

Observe that, while the file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, no file extension is shown for the saved file.
